list.name: Basic
list.desc: Perfect for startups and small businesses needing a professional website.

Design & Development: Custom Website Design: Tailored to reflect your brand
Responsive Design: Optimized for all devices
Up to 5 Pages: Includes homepage, about us, services, contact, and blog
Content: 1 Blog Post (500 words): Engaging and relevant content
Website Features: CMS Integration: User-friendly platform for content management
Meta Tags Creation: Basic SEO tags for visibility
Contact Form: Basic integration for customer inquiries
Support: 1 Revision Round: Minor adjustments based on feedback
30 Days Post-Launch Support: Addressing initial issues and updates
Reporting: Basic Analytics Setup: Google Analytics integration for performance tracking
Features: Client Dashboard Access: View project progress and updates 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

list.name: Standard
list.desc: Ideal for established businesses seeking a more robust web solution.

Design & Development: Custom Website Design: Advanced design elements with enhanced functionality
Responsive Design: Fully optimized for all devices
Up to 10 Pages: Includes additional custom pages
Content: 2 Articles (400 words each): High-quality, tailored content
2 Blog Posts (500 words each): Engaging and strategic content
Website Features: CMS Integration: Robust platform with extended features
Meta Tags Creation: Comprehensive SEO tags for better visibility
Contact Form Integration: For efficient customer communication
Social Media Integration: Links to your social media profiles
Support: 2 Revision Rounds: Extensive adjustments based on feedback
60 Days Post-Launch Support: Ongoing support for updates and minor changes
Reporting: Advanced Analytics Setup: Detailed performance tracking and reporting
Features: 24/7 Support: Phone, email, and chat support
Client Dashboard Access: Detailed project and performance view
CDedicated Project Manager: Personal point of contact for support 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

list.name: Professional
list.desc: For businesses needing a high-end, custom website with advanced features.

Design & Development: Bespoke Website Design: Completely custom design with advanced functionalities
Responsive Design: Optimized with custom animations and interactions
Unlimited Pages: Includes all necessary pages and custom functionalities
Content: 4 Articles (400 words each): In-depth, professionally written content
4 Blog Posts (500 words each): High-quality, engaging content
Website Features: Custom CMS Integration: Advanced platform tailored to your needs
Meta Tags Creation: Extensive optimization for maximum visibility
E-commerce Integration: For online sales and transactions (if applicable)
Advanced Contact Form: Enhanced features for customer interactions
Social Media Integration: Comprehensive integration for all platforms
Support: 3 Revision Rounds: Comprehensive adjustments based on feedback
90 Days Post-Launch Support: Extensive support for ongoing needs and updates
Reporting: Advanced Analytics Setup: In-depth performance insights and comprehensive reporting
Features: 24/7 Premium Support: Priority phone, email, and chat support
Client Dashboard Access: Full visibility into project and performance metrics
Dedicated Project Manager: Personalized management and support 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
